About

Csongor knows how to tell stories on the web, and, how to make them work.

He offers consulting, design, development, deployment and optimization services for international companies and organizations.

Clients

Think Tank Fund

Open Society Institute's Think Tank Fund is an international data-driven policy research organization.

With a team of experts in information design we've conducted a field research for open source visualisation tools embeddabble in their projects. And presented our findings in a responsive website which prints with a click.

Services

  • Consulting
  • Responsive web design and development

Technologies

  • HTML5
  • CSS3
  • SASS
  • Compass
  • jQuery
  • Jekyll

Scatter is a local advertising startup matching service buyers and lenders.

My task was to create a series of landing pages to present their product.

The Organized Crime and Corruption Reporting Project is an international organization investigating corruption worldwide.
